Reviews.Title: Hey!
Reviews.Author: Tryg
Reviews.Content: This camera was very adequate for the price. I am kind of rough on my electronics, so having a cheap decent camera is nice. I bike a lot so I take photos and this camera is fast response and nice quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Horrible Vendor
Reviews.Author: Garcyrus
Reviews.Content: Camera works excellent, my 10 year old son is constantly making videos and uploading to youtube.  The camera is easy to use and has excellet quality pics and HD movies.The vendor was horrible, needed to cancel first order and order from another vendor, second time a charm!

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot camera.
Reviews.Author: jac neal
Reviews.Content: So far I like this camera just fine. It takes beautiful pictures and is easy to use, just what I wanted. The thing I didn't like is the download cord is like eight inches long! My tower sits on the floor so of course I had to buy another separate one.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Ni'anhel Moore
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera to start out with. Easy to use and takes very good quality pictures. I would gladly buy it again for gifts.

Reviews.Title: Camera not work.
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Williams
Reviews.Content: The camera worked for several times briefly & then it went black. I just sent it back to sender.  I usally like Samsung cameras.

ProductInfo.Features: Samsung PL series PL20 14.2 MP Digital Camera - Red
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung PL20 14.2 MP Digital Still Camera with 5x Zoom -Red
